DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability, pharmacokinetics (PK) and pharmacodynamics (PD) of BMS-986090 in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, PK, and PD of BMS-986090 in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com. Healthy male and female (of not childbearing potential), ages 1845 years, inclusive BMI 18 to 32 kg/m2, inclusive Any significant acute or chronic medical illness
